hero_subtitle: Two exceptional golf courses in the heart of Burgos

paquete_tour_boogie_desc: Explore the course by buggy. Premium bucket option (champagne, beers, wine).
paquete_pausa_drive_desc: Quick 9-hole green fee with buggy and menu. For travellers.
paquete_36_hoyos_title: 36 Holes SaldaÃ±a Golf and Golf Lerma

sostenibilidad_quote: "Before every shot there is an idea. Behind it, a justification"
sostenibilidad_text: Golf Lerma reinforces its commitment to sustainability with a new solar installation carried out by Norsol. This project reduces our energy consumption and carbon footprint, and is backed by EU Next Generation funds within the Recovery, Transformation and Resilience Plan.
newsletter_title: WOULD YOU LIKE TO SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER?
newsletter_privacy: I have read and accept the privacy policy
newsletter_privacy_html: I have read and accept the privacy policy
footer_bottom: Copyright Â© Golf Lerma 2024 Â· Privacy policy Â· Legal notice Â· Data protection
cookie_text: We use our own and third-party cookies to analyse our services and show you advertising related to your preferences based on a profile created from your browsing habits (e.g. pages visited). You can find out more and configure your preferences here.
inst_salon_desc: Cosy space for events and social gatherings
inst_tienda_desc: Selection of the best golf brands, equipment and cornershop
inst_casa_club_desc: Club house with all amenities for members and visitors
restaurante_text1: The course restaurant offers a succulent menu with the best dishes of traditional Castilian cuisine, while also embracing new cuisine trends, prioritising the quality of all products. Alongside a wine list where Ribera del Duero is obviously present in its finest expressions, the roast suckling lamb becomes, thanks to its wood-fired oven, a monument to the palate.
restaurante_text2: In addition to this representative dish, Golf Lerma Restaurant offers its customers an extensive menu, including a daily special.
guia_text1: Built in 1992 on an old 220-hectare hunting estate called La Andaya, Golf Lerma combines in its 18 holes the grandiose simplicity of Castilian nature and the entertaining complexity of the game of golf. A landscape of wide, luminous horizons, sober orography and powerful vegetation, easy to walk but less easy to negotiate when the wind decides to join the game, which happens two out of three days.
guia_cita: "The course is already made; God made it", said designer Pepe Gancedo, the course architect, when he first surveyed the land before putting on paper what is now a reality.
guia_text2: Holm oaks, junipers and oaks dot the 5,900 metres of its fairways where it is not uncommon to see hares running or to spot flocks of ducks and geese resting and feeding in one of the eight lakes and two streams that line the course.
recorrido_text1: Golf Lerma has 18 holes spread over 5,900 metres. Designed by Pepe Gancedo on the natural site of La Andaya, it combines wide fairways with technical challenges on the greens.
recorrido_text2: Eight lakes and two streams accompany the play, adding excitement to several holes. The wind, common on the Castilian plateau, turns each round into a different challenge.
recorrido_par: Par 72 Â· 5,900 m Â· Course of wide horizons with holm oaks, junipers and oaks.
bodas_intro: Celebrate your special event in a unique setting. Golf Lerma offers exceptional facilities for unforgettable weddings and events.
boda_organizar_texto: Weddings take place at Finca Andaya Golf Lerma, the Golf Lerma venue dedicated to the most special day of your life. We will redirect you to their website.
btn_ir_andaya: Go to Finca Andaya Golf Lerma
otros_eventos_intro: For communions, family reunions or other events (excluding weddings), please provide your email and message. Your email client will open; you just need to send. Or contact us directly.
placeholder_mensaje: Type of event, approximate dates, number of guests...

placeholder_mensaje_empresa: Tell us what type of event or activity interests you (tournament, meeting, incentive, approximate dates...).
simulador_intro: In the heart of Burgos, our simulator allows you to practise and play on the best courses in the world without leaving the city.
ranking_intro: The best results recorded on course and simulator. Only official rounds count.
ranking_cta: Think you can beat them? Book your session

reservar_horario_desc: Choose your slot, access with the smartlock and play on the simulator whenever suits you best.

ubicacion_text: Access to the premises is via a smartlock on the door. Once you have booked your slot from this website, you will receive instructions to access autonomously and enjoy the simulator.
hazte_socio_sub: With the monthly maintenance fee, enjoy Golf Lerma and SaldaÃ±a Golf, and special rates at the Burgos simulator (Lain Calvo 12). Family usage rights from day one.
hazte_socio_intro: By paying the monthly maintenance fee (no registration fees), you can enjoy both courses and special rates at the Burgos simulator (Lain Calvo 12). At the time of registration you will have the assignment of a family usage right (not shares).
hazte_socio_nota: Registration forms available at the course offices or via the form.
correspondencias_intro: Members of clubs with which we have a reciprocal agreement can play at Golf Lerma and SaldaÃ±a Golf at the indicated rate. For bookings and packages, by selecting your club in the dropdown, the reciprocal price will be automatically applied.

config_hotel_intro: Choose the hotel for each night. You can combine Lerma and Burgos (e.g. one night in Lerma and one in Burgos).
config_hotel_hint: First choose the location (Lerma or Burgos) and then the hotel in that location.

config_comida_sin_fechas: Select dates in the calendar to indicate meals and dinners per day.
